[[Sasuke]] attacks his opponent with sword slashes and kicks, uses [[Banshō Ten'in]] to pull them closer and stun them with [[Chidori Sharp Spear]], before jumping up and throwing a [[kunai]] behind his opponent, which he [[Amenotejikara|switches]] with, and slashes them with an electrified slash from his sword.
